Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
IControllerMtoV, IControllerVtoM
public class Controller extends Object implements IControllerVtoM, IControllerMtoV
Controller class that implements the IControllerVtoM and IControllerMtoV interfaces. This class is responsible for managing the simulation, including starting, stopping, and updating the simulation engine and UI.

  • Method Details

    • setSimulatorGUI

      public void setSimulatorGUI(SimulatorGUI simulatorGUI)
      Sets the SimulatorGUI instance for this controller. This method binds the arrival interval and EU flight percentage sliders to the engine.
      Specified by:
      setSimulatorGUI in interface IControllerVtoM
      Parameters:
      simulatorGUI - The SimulatorGUI instance to be set.

    • startSimulation

      public void startSimulation()
      Starts the simulation. This method initializes the engine and starts the simulation.
      Specified by:
      startSimulation in interface IControllerVtoM

    • decreaseSpeed

      public void decreaseSpeed()
      Decreases the speed of the simulation. This method increases the delay of the engine to slow down the simulation.
      Specified by:
      decreaseSpeed in interface IControllerVtoM

    • increaseSpeed

      public void increaseSpeed()
      Increases the speed of the simulation. This method decreases the delay of the engine to speed up the simulation.
      Specified by:
      increaseSpeed in interface IControllerVtoM

    • showEndTime

      public void showEndTime(double time)
      Displays the end time of the simulation in the UI. This method is called from the engine to update the visualization with the end time.
      Specified by:
      showEndTime in interface IControllerMtoV
      Parameters:
      time - The end time of the simulation.

    • visualiseCustomer

      public void visualiseCustomer()
      Visualizes a new customer in the UI. This method is called from the engine to update the visualization with a new customer.
      Specified by:
      visualiseCustomer in interface IControllerMtoV

    • updateQueueLengths

      public void updateQueueLengths(List<List<Integer>> queueLengths)
      Updates the queue lengths in the UI. This method is called from the engine to update the visualization with the current queue lengths.
      Specified by:
      updateQueueLengths in interface IControllerMtoV
      Parameters:
      queueLengths - A list of lists representing the lengths of different queues.

    • pauseSimulation

      public void pauseSimulation()
      Pauses the simulation. This method sets the isPaused flag to true and notifies the engine to pause.
      Specified by:
      pauseSimulation in interface IControllerVtoM

    • resumeSimulation

      public void resumeSimulation()
      Resumes the simulation. This method sets the isPaused flag to false and notifies the engine to resume.
      Specified by:
      resumeSimulation in interface IControllerVtoM

    • checkPaused

      public void checkPaused()
      Checks if the simulation is paused. This method blocks the current thread until the simulation is resumed.
      Specified by:
      checkPaused in interface IControllerMtoV

    • getAllAirports

      public List<Airport> getAllAirports()
      Retrieves all airports from the database. This method queries the database for all airports and returns them as a list.
      Specified by:
      getAllAirports in interface IControllerVtoM
      Returns:
      A list of Airport objects representing all airports in the database.

    • getConfigsByAirportId

      public List<ServicePointConfig> getConfigsByAirportId(org.bson.types.ObjectId airportId)
      Retrieves service point configurations by airport ID. This method queries the database for service point configurations associated with a specific airport ID.
      Specified by:
      getConfigsByAirportId in interface IControllerVtoM
      Parameters:
      airportId - The ObjectId of the airport for which to retrieve service point configurations.
      Returns:
      A list of ServicePointConfig objects associated with the specified airport ID.

    • stopSimulation

      public void stopSimulation()
      Stops the simulation. This method stops the engine and clears the UI.
      Specified by:
      stopSimulation in interface IControllerVtoM

    • resetSimulation

      public void resetSimulation()
      Resets the simulation. This method clears the UI elements and resets the engine if it exists.
      Specified by:
      resetSimulation in interface IControllerVtoM

    • showResults

      public void showResults(String results)

      Specified by:
      showResults in interface IControllerMtoV
      Parameters:

    • getGraphData

      public void getGraphData()
      Retrieves graph data from the model and updates the view. This method ensures the UI updates safely by executing the data retrieval on the JavaFX application thread using Platform.runLater().
      Specified by:
      getGraphData in interface IControllerVtoM

    • setExternalViewButton

      public void setExternalViewButton()
      Enables the external view button in the simulator GUI. This method sets the button's disabled state to false, allowing user interaction.
      Specified by:
      setExternalViewButton in interface IControllerMtoV

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the simulation. This method creates a new engine instance and initializes it.
